channel.title: Add CRS++ Non-flow data
channel.description: This [issue](http://support.iatistandard.org/hc/en-us/articles/214388506-Non-flow-data) was originally added and discussed on the previous version IATI Standard Upgrade forum. However that forum has now itself moved to the IATI Discuss platform so this topic has been created in order that discussions can continue here.
